title: Blended Learning-Based Math Competency Enhancement Program for Female Entrepreneurs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and business administration knowledge
context.additional_context: A mobile-based blended learning program delivering essential mathematical competencies for corporate operations to in-service professionals, conducted in a BYOD environment with formative assessment focus.

learning_goals: Participants can apply mathematical modeling techniques for financial analysis with 90% accuracy
Participants can improve their ability to perform probabilistic statistical analysis for business risk assessment to an 85% achievement level
Participants can apply data-driven decision-making processes using mathematical techniques to three or more real-world cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
